text: wadhkur -ayha alrswl- yawm nahshur alkhalq jamieaan llhsab waljza', thuma naqul liladhin 'ashrakuu ballh: alzmu makanakum 'antum washurakawukum aladhin kuntum tebdwnhm min dun allah hataa tnzru maa yufel bkm, fafarraqna bayn almushrikin wmebwdyhm, wtbrra man eubiduu min dun allah mmn kanuu yebdwnhm, waqaluu llmshrkyn: maa kuntum 'iiaana taebudun fi aldnya
